    Creates a vector from polar coordinates: (1) theta, θ, an angle in radians, the vector's heading; (2) rho, ρ, a radius, the vector's magnitude.

    Creates a vector with a magnitude of 1.0 from an angle, such that the vector is on the unit circle.
    static Vec3 Vec3.fromPolar​(double azimuth, double radius, Vec3 target)
    Creates a vector from polar coordinates: (1) theta, θ, an angle in radians, the vector's azimuth; (2) rho, ρ, a radius, the vector's magnitude.
    static Vec3 Vec3.fromPolar​(double azimuth, Vec3 target)
    Creates a vector with a magnitude of 1.0 from an angle, such that the vector is on the equator of the unit sphere.
    static Mat3 Mat3.fromRotZ​(double radians, Mat3 target)
    Creates a rotation matrix from an angle in radians around the z axis.
    static Vec3 Vec3.fromSpherical​(double azimuth, double inclination, double radius, Vec3 target)
    Creates a vector from spherical coordinates: (1) theta, θ, the azimuth or longitude; (2) phi, φ, the inclination or latitude; (3) rho, ρ, the radius or magnitude.
